description: KubernetesDeploymentSpec defines the desired state of the Kubernetes deployment resource.

container.description: Container defines the desired specification of main container.

initContainers.description: List of initialization containers belonging to the pod. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/init-containers/

name.description: Name of the deployment. When unset, this defaults to an autogenerated name.

patch.description: Patch defines how to perform the patch operation to deployment

pod.description: Pod defines the desired specification of pod.

replicas.description: Replicas is the number of desired pods. Defaults to 1.

strategy.description: The deployment strategy to use to replace existing pods with new ones.
